message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.SI, cs.LG

The paper deals with the problem of sequential coding of correlated sources, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The specific application mentioned is video coding, which falls under multimedia (cs.MM) and computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the use of fidelity criteria, which is relevant to signal processing (cs.SI) and machine learning (cs.LG).
